page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED.
page.content: During "Planet of the Apes" we stopped to have some lunch.For the rest of the afternoon we watched Live Aid.Then Mum told us to come and have a look at the hot-air balloon flying over us it was red and white.We had a barbecue tea and watched Live Aid.Then we went to bed. Live Aid was a special world-wide T.V. programme to raise money for people that are starving because of lack of food and water such as Ethiopians.The programme lasted for 16 hours and is the first of its kind.So far they have raised over 40 million pounds. SATURDAY WITH MUM. I woke up about half past seven so did mum. Mum and I got all the hair- dressing kit ready it was about half past eight. So we put the hair- dressing kit in the car and set off.
